settings.heading: Mushroom Matrix
settings.subtext: Bringing the powerful health benefits of mushrooms to horses, pets and the people that love them.

settings.custom_liquid:
*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. We always recommend that you consult your Doctor, Veterinarian or other licensed Medical Professional with any medical questions or concerns you may have.
*Orders that qualify for free shipping are applicable only to delivery locations located in the contiguous United States.
